mapper.select: SELECT course.* FROM(select c.C_ID, c.M_ID, c.I_NAME, c.C_NAME, c.C_FILENAME from course c, member m where c.M_ID = m.M_ID AND m.M_ID = #{m_id} ORDER by c.c_id desc)course WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

select cd.cd_id as cd_id , cd.c_id as c_id , cd.cd_start as cd_start , cd.CD_STIME as cd_stime , cd.CD_END as cd_end , cd.CD_ETIME as cd_etime from COURSEDETAIL cd, COURSE c, MEMBER m where cd.C_ID = c.C_ID AND m.M_ID = c.M_ID AND m.M_ID = #{m_id} AND c.C_ID = #{c_id}
